WeaponTraitDef.label: insightful
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona speaks long forgotten truths to its bond. The person bonded to it gains extra research speed so long as they are bonded.

HediffDef.label: psychic truth
HediffDef.description: Research speed is increased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: rambling
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona constantly rambles useless distractions into their bond's mind. The bonded pawn takes a -15% hit to their research speed so long as the bond holds.

HediffDef.label: psychic mental derailment
HediffDef.description: Research speed is decreased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: driven
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona fills it's bond with energy, driving it forward. The bonded pawn gains a 40% increase to global work speed.

HediffDef.label: psychic work drive
HediffDef.description: My global work speed is increased by my bonded weapon.

WeaponTraitDef.label: slacking
WeaponTraitDef.description: This weapon's persona seeks to 'conserve the high energy state of the universe' by resisting energy state changes made willingly by its boonded. The bonded pawn loses 40% global work speed.

HediffDef.label: psychic energy state change inhibitor
HediffDef.description: My global work speed is decreased by my bonded weapon.
